title: Deletion of publications from "FTA Reports and Publications"

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any record of a specific request, instruction, or demand which resulted in the deletion of listing for two specific publications from a web page of the Federal Transit Administration: ("FTA Reports and Publications" at https://www.transit.dot.gov/research-innovation/fta-reports-and-publications ) as well as any record reporting the deletion was made. 

The two removed reports were 

Title: Practical Measures for Advancing Public Transit Equity and Access (Report 0249) 
Publication Date: July 2023
Document Type: Research Report
Category: Planning & Policy

and

Title: Transit Resilience Guidebook (Report 0265)
Publication Date: May 2024
Document Type: Research Report
Category: Infrastructure; Planning and Policy; Transit Asset Management

The act of removal was performed some time between 2/8/2025 and 2/14/2025, both dates being approximate.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

T. McElwee
